# Atelier Archilles - Photography Studio Rental Budapest

## Summary

Atelier Archilles is a premium photography studio rental service located in Budapest, Hungary (District 11). We offer three unique, architect-designed studios totaling 260 square meters, perfect for portrait photography, fashion shoots, product photography, and commercial projects.

## Services

- Photography studio rental (hourly basis)
- Portrait photography studio
- Fashion photography studio  
- Product photography studio
- Catalog photography workspace
- Lifestyle and family photography space
- Filming and workshop venue
- Event space rental

## Studio Details

### Atelier Studio
- Size: 120 m²
- Style: Rustic atmosphere
- Features: Natural light, ideal for family and portrait photography
- Best for: Portrait sessions, family photography

### Frigyes Studio
- Style: Modern minimalist with Japandi design elements
- Features: Natural light, clean aesthetic
- Best for: Branding, lifestyle photography, commercial work

### Karinthy Studio
- Style: Youthful, clean, apartment-like setting
- Features: 3 large windows, abundant natural light, living room + kitchen
- Best for: Fashion photography, editorial shoots, lifestyle content

## Location

**Address:** Karinthy Frigyes út 19, 1111 Budapest, Hungary (District 11)  
**Nearest Metro:** Móricz Zsigmond körtér (M4 line)  
**GPS Coordinates:** 47.476205, 19.052146  
**Parking:** Available at Karinthy Parkoló (450 HUF/hour)

## Operating Hours

Monday - Sunday: 08:00 - 20:00

## Contact

**Phone:** +36 30 974 7362  
**Email:** anna@archilles.hu  
**Website:** https://www.atelier-archilles.hu  
**Booking:** https://www.atelier-archilles.hu/booking

## Social Media

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atelierarchilles
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atelier_archilles/
- Portfolio: https://www.archilles.hu/

## Designer

Studios designed by Anna Illés, renowned Hungarian architect and designer.

## Keywords

fotóstúdió bérlés, photography studio rental, stúdió bérlés budapest, műterem bérlés, alkotótér, professzionális fotózás, természetes fény, design stúdió, 11 kerület, divatfotózás, termékfotó, katalógusfotó, lifestyle fotózás, családi fotózás, portré fotózás, forgatás, workshop helyszín

## Languages

Hungarian (primary), English

## Technical Details

- Payment methods: Card, Online payment (Barion)
- Currencies accepted: HUF
- Booking system: Online reservation with instant confirmation
- Equipment: Professional lighting, natural light options
- Amenities: Changing area, various furnishings and accessories

## Target Audience

- Professional photographers
- Fashion photographers
- Product photographers
- Portrait photographers
- Content creators
- Commercial production companies
- Workshop organizers
- Event planners
